channel.title: Quest Tab [PI]
channel.description:
Well, I've been editing my quest tab, [b]by hand[/b], for a while now. I can't manage to figure out how to make it say "Ranking: Mod, Admin, Owner, Donator, Player"
Etc etc.
Heres along the lines what i was thinking, but I haven't been quite sure so far, so i was wondering if any of you could help meh. :D
[code]getPA().sendFrame126("Rank: "c.playerRights= 1 ("Mod")" "c.playerRights= 2 ("Admin")" c.playerRights= 3 ("Owner")" c.playerRights= 4 ("Donor")""", 29167);[/code] would that be right? :D
